pull.title: [doc] netaddress: Make IPv4 loopback comment more descriptive
pull.body: This also makes the comment match the IPv6 comment just below this hunk.

The`error C2065: 'g_logger': undeclared identifier` Appveyor failure has been fixed in #15347.

comments.body: Don't forget to install `clang-format` and run the https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/tree/master/contrib/devtools#clang-format-diffpy script to preempt whitespace nitpicking.
